codeSystems.name: WHO_TRUST_ACTOR
codeSystems.title: WHO.TRUST.ACTOR CodeSystem
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for TRUST.ACTOR that has usage codes for verification keys published to the Trust Network as defined by the [certificate governance](concepts_certificate_governance.html)
